subject: Re: Hello
author: draiga1
full_text:
Hello Steve,

I also collect haunted dolls and other objects. I don't have as many dolls as your wife does, but I do enjoy them. It's nice to have a fellow collector here. Welcome!

~Draiga


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "steve gunn" <steve@...> wrote:
>
> Sweet !!! They're not quite like that but shadows, voices, things moving, orbs, lights and stuff are everyday occurances here. I even got thrown out of bed one day a few years ago with a spirit who wanted too much attention..
>
